name: Storage Bucket does not have Access and Storage Logging enabled
description: Checks to verify that the configuration on the Storage Buckets is enabled for access logs and storage logs.
searchModel.query: config from cloud.resource where api.name= 'gcloud-storage-buckets-list'  AND json.rule = '$.logging == null'
recommendation:
Follow the steps mentioned in the below link to enable Access and Storage logs using GSUTIL or JSON API.
      Reference : https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/access-logs
